definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The earth and the sunshine are something everlasting which could never be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 大地和阳光是绝然不会被遗忘的永恒。

sentences.english: Many people pose tradition and modernization as diametrically opposite.
sentences.chinese: 许多人将传统与现代化绝然对立起来。

sentences.english: Now we are under very different circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 如今我们处在绝然不同的形势下。

sentences.english: Cats and dogs have entirely different nature.
sentences.chinese: 猫与狗的天性绝然不同。

sentences.english: River the Zhi orchid facial expression one of unique however.
sentences.chinese: 江芷兰神情一片的绝然。

sentences.english: If you can please give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 你怎能绝然离去，扔下我一人？

definition: to sever all relations with sb/determined/decisive
to burn both jade and common stone/to destroy indiscriminately (idiom)
lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom)/fig. resolute and decisive/unhesitating/categorical
to persist/to continue upholding/to persevere/to stick to sth/stubborn
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
